sentences: Ta oli kasutanud selle võtme avamiseks.
Nad kasutavad seda tarkvarat töö jaoks.
context: The word 'kasutasin' is the first person singular past tense form of the Estonian verb 'kasutama', which means to use something. It is commonly used in sentences to describe an action that was done in the past, where the subject used an object or a method to achieve something.
